item.title: a magical quest
item.description:
a magical quest

“Dive into your heart center. Sit in the silence. Desire self-realization with all your heart, with all your mind, and all your soul. Everything will take care of itself.” - Robert Adams

item.title: On this beautiful day - My mystical journey

On this beautiful day - My mystical journey

On this beautiful day,

item.title: The Fearful
item.description:
The Fearful

We are human beings, and as such are verbs, a set of processes, not a noun. How terrible must it be to live in fear all the time. To always be angry, everything's a mountain to climb. The fearful; love to puff up their chest, to project and complain, but never address, just play victim and blame and then shamefully shame. I really don't understand how blind, can blind be. Society must countermand and re-find its sanity.

item.title: an ageless essence
item.description:
an ageless essence

I stare, into the knowing of an ageless essence, only aware, by my coming and going in a child like innocence. I sense in each flower the infinite unchanging. Though my senses will devour the illusions they're arranging. For that which arises in time, ends in time, and in between, what is true for me, expresses, externally. My eyes will challenge, in heated negotiation, my nose smells and measures, each fragrant deviation, and my soul, will sense in the world, the whole, of creation.
